data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 424,840 lost in Giresun that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Giresun, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 159 believers in Giresun, Turkey to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Giresun.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Giresun.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Chechen people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Chechen people.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Giresun to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Giresun access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Giresun, Turkey that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
